revised_title: The Planters Manual: A Comprehensive Guide to Fruit Tree Cultivation
tldr: The Planters Manual provides detailed instructions for raising, planting, and cultivating various fruit trees, including stonefruits and pepin-fruits. It offers guidance on selecting the right soil, planting distances, aspects, and avoiding damaging winds. The book also covers transplanting, grafting, and cultivating trees throughout the seasons, as well as preventing insect damage and other potential issues.
